name: Roxy's Windows
description:
What's going on with Roxy?

----

Sift and sort your way through Roxy's cluttered desktop to uncover the truth! Roxy's Windows is an interactive story based game where you're free to take things at your own pace; learn more about Roxy and her friends through the files on her computer, organizing them as you please.

Created as a part of Stepford's Mobile Game Jam on Newgrounds, this game can be played entirely with touch controls on your mobile device (or left clicking with the mouse if you're on a computer) If you spend enough time exploring, you might even be rewarded for your efforts!

---CONTROLS---

Tap/Click to open a file

Hold and Drag to move a file

*Text can be sped up by tapping to get to the next line of the file (we'll improve this later, promise!)

-- SOUNDTRACK --

If you loved the soundtrack, check it out here on Spotify!

-- PATCH NOTES --

The changelog was getting a bit long for this section, so it's available for viewing here!

If you have any technical issues to bring up in your review, please let me know what device and browser you're using! That makes it much easier for me to track down bugs.

Also, if you choose to log in via Newgrounds Passport, if the log in page never successfully completes even after you sign in via the pop-up, please refresh and try again. Newgrounds' Passport system may not always successfully send the login signal. 

-- CONTENT NOTE --

Game contains some content not suitable for minors, including some strong language and mature themes - consider this a "T" rating. Marking the game as having sensitive content on Itch.io automatically marks it as 18+, though, which I wouldn't say is fitting for this game.
